verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> hath he quickened, who <S%G5607>were<s%> <S%G3498>dead<s%> in <S%G3900>trespasses<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G266>sins<s%>

Wherein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> in time <S%G4218>past<s%> ye <S%G4043>walked<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G165>course<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G2889>world,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G758>prince<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G109>air,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> that now <S%G1754>worketh<s%> <S%G3568><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5207>children<s%> of disobedience: <S%G543><s%>

Among <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> had our <S%G390>conversation<s%> in times <S%G4218>past<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1939>lusts<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> <S%G4160>fulfilling<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2307>desires<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1271>mind;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> by <S%G5449>nature<s%> the <S%G5043>children<s%> of <S%G3709>wrath,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G3062>others.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> who <S%G5607>is<s%> <S%G4145>rich<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1656>mercy,<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G3739>wherewith<s%> he <S%G25>loved<s%> <S%G2248>us,<s%>

Even <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G2248>we<s%> <S%G5607>were<s%> <S%G3498>dead<s%> in <S%G3900>sins,<s%> hath quickened us <S%G4806>together<s%> with Christ, <S%G5547>by<s%> <S%G5485>(grace<s%> ye <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G4982>saved;)<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> hath raised us up <S%G4891>together,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> made us sit <S%G4776>together<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2032>heavenly<s%> places <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> Jesus: <S%G2424><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G165>ages<s%> to <S%G1904>come<s%> he might <S%G1731>show<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5235>exceeding<s%> <S%G4149>riches<s%> of <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> his <S%G5544>kindness<s%> <S%G1909>toward<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> by <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G2075>are<s%> ye <S%G4982>saved<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5124>that<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5216>yourselves:<s%> it is <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1435>gift<s%> of God: <S%G2316><s%>
Not <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2041>works,<s%> <S%G3363>lest<s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> should <S%G2744>boast.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> we <S%G2070>are<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4161>workmanship,<s%> <S%G2936>created<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>works,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> hath before <S%G4282>ordained<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> we should <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> <S%G3421>remember,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> being in time <S%G4218>past<s%> <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> are <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G203>Uncircumcision<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> that which is <S%G3004>called<s%> the <S%G4061>Circumcision<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> made by <S%G5499>hands;<s%>

That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> ye <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> being <S%G526>aliens<s%> from <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4174>commonwealth<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3581>strangers<s%> from <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1242>covenants<s%> of <S%G1860>promise,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G1680>hope,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> without <S%G112>God<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> world: <S%G2889><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3570>now<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> who sometimes <S%G5607>were<s%> <S%G4218><s%> far <S%G3112>off<s%> are <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G1451>nigh<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G1515>peace,<s%> who hath <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G297>both<s%> <S%G1520>one,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> hath broken <S%G3089>down<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> middle <S%G3320>wall<s%> of <S%G5418>partition<s%> between us;

Having <S%G2673>abolished<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2189>enmity,<s%> even <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G1785>commandments<s%> contained <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1378>ordinances;<s%> for <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G2936>make<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> of <S%G1417>twain<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G444>man,<s%> so <S%G4160>making<s%> <S%G1515>peace;<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> that he might <S%G604>reconcile<s%> <S%G297>both<s%> unto <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4716>cross,<s%> having <S%G615>slain<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2189>enmity<s%> <S%G1722>thereby:<s%> <S%G846><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G2097>preached<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> which were afar <S%G3112>off,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to them that were <S%G1451>nigh.<s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> we <S%G297>both<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4318>access<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3962>Father.<s%>

Now <S%G686><s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> ye <S%G2075>are<s%> no <S%G3765>more<s%> <S%G3581>strangers<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3941>foreigners,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> fellow <S%G4847>citizens<s%> with <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G40>saints,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G3609>household<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%>

And are <S%G2026>built<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2310>foundation<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G652>apostles<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G5607>being<s%> the chief <S%G204>corner<s%> stone;

In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3619>building<s%> fitly framed <S%G4883>together<s%> <S%G837>groweth<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> a <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G3485>temple<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the Lord: <S%G2962><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> are builded <S%G4925>together<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> a <S%G2732>habitation<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>
